verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kanikara mandaiswaryundu Ninu vaatsalyamutho vimochinchunu Bhayankaramaina paapamunundi Vidipimpa ninnu vedaki vachchen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manninchu sarva paapamulan Thaane maanpunu sarva rogamulan Krupa kanikaramula makutamu neeku Dhariyimpa jesi ghanaparachun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andhulaku drusti kalugajese Anga heenulanu lepi naduva jesen Paluvidhamulagu vedhigrstulkuswasthatha Nechchru taskshnume{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapapu bharamu bhariyinchen Nee rogamulanniti tholaginchan Sahinchenu koradaa debbala baadhanu Jayainchenu anni shodanalan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Caluvari siluvalo vrelaadi Thana rakhtamu chindinche dhaaralugaa Chetulalo thana kaallalo cheelalu Mundla kireetamu dhariyinche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeeva mitchutaku praanamide Mari jayinchenu pratividha shodhanalu Nee korakai maraninchi lechenu Shakhtimanthude ninu rakshimpa{/lang-eng}
